Task: Tell me about a time you solved a tough technical problem.
Details/Resources: Practice STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result). Amazon LP: 'Invent and Simplify'. Resource: https://www.interviewkickstart.com/interview-questions/amazon-leadership-principles
Read System Design Primer: https://github.com/donnemartin/system-design-primer#load-balancer and caching section. Take notes on why load balancers improve scalability.

Task: Tell me about a time you disagreed with a teammate.
Details/Resources: Practice STAR. Google values 'collaboration' and Amazon LP 'Have Backbone; Disagree and Commit'. Resource: https://igotanoffer.com/blogs/tech/behavioral-interview-questions
Read about SQL vs NoSQL. https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/sql-vs-nosql/ Compare trade-offs in scalability and consistency.
LeetCode #242 - Use sorting O(n log n) or HashMap O(n). https://leetcode.com/problems/valid-anagram/

Task: Tell me about a time you failed.
Details/Resources: Practice showing what you learned from failure. Amazon LP 'Learn and Be Curious'. Resource: https://www.pathrise.com/guides/behavioral-interview-questions/
